data.eml:eml: Three new species in the leafhopper genus Angustuma (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Evacanthinae) from Thailand

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Yang, Zhang, Yalin (2014): Three new species in the leafhopper genus Angustuma (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Evacanthinae) from Thailand. Zootaxa 3893 (4): 587-594, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3893.4.8
